review: This is my 2nd Roku stick. I love Roku😀 Don't miss the cab!e bill at all!
author: Amanda "Amanda Workman"

review: My streaming blu Ray finally crapped out and stopped streaming so this was supposed to be my cheap fix until I can afford a larger smart tv for theLiving room. This streams so well and connects to my wifi better than my blu ray ever did and it was hooked into the Ethernet. Great purchase!
author: Sarah

review: I want to recommend this to my parents. However, there were a few updates and that needed to be installed... so they may get a little discouraged with the installation process. I didn't mind it. It took about 10 minutes to set up and it worked perfectly once installed.
author: Kristen Merry

review: Professor is slow, but it works well.
author: LeyaRuth

review: Havent turned on cable tv in bedroom since i received this (3 months)....40 bucks well spent
author: d felt

review: We use this for Netflix...works great.
author: Eric B. Blackwell
